raw akas.title: NFL Rush Zone: Season of the Guardians
NFL Rush Zone: Guardians of the Core

akas: NFL Rush Zone: Season of the Guardians USA (English title) (second season title)
NFL Rush Zone: Guardians of the Core USA (English title) (first season title)
NFL Rush Zone: Guardians Unleashed USA (English title) (third season title)
akas from release info: NFL Rush Zone: Season of the Guardians USA (English title) (second season title)
NFL Rush Zone: Guardians of the Core USA (English title) (first season title)
NFL Rush Zone: Guardians Unleashed USA (English title) (third season title)

1.title: The Return of Sudden Death
1.plot: The Guardians seek the help of Cleveland Browns' Joe Haden and San Diego Chargers' Ryan Mathews, when an old enemy returns.

2.title: Ish's Audible
2.plot: Sudden Death and his new allies, the Anticorians, attempt to recruit Ish with the promise of restoring his powers, but Detroit Lions Calvin Johnson reminds Ish that real power is something he has to find within himself.

3.title: Redzone Retaliation
3.plot: Ish must save the Guardians when they are trapped in a video game; head coaches Mike Tomlin and Marvin Lewis help Ish deal with Sudden Death.

4.title: Downstream Revenge
4.plot: Green Bay Packers Jordy Nelson aids Tua with some family matters just as the Anticorians use the elements at hand to launch a major attack on Lambeau Field. The Miami Dolphins Ryan Tannehill helps the Guardians save the day.

5.title: Gone Viral
5.plot: Sudden Death unleashes a diabolical virus to ruin the holidays. Kansas City Chiefs Jamaal Charles and New York Giants Justin Tuck jump in to help, and RZ6.0 has a perfect present for the Guardians that will save the season.

6.title: White Hot
6.plot: The Anticorians use a snow storm to launch an attack; the Guardians get help from Julius Peppers, Matt Forte and Russell Wilson.

7.title: Web of Deceit
7.plot: Determined to become second in command, Stellaria captures Megacores, along with Ash and Denver Broncos Eric Decker, using a secret weapon. With the help of the Baltimore Ravens Ray Rice, the Guardians unravel Stellaria's plan.

8.title: Rivals Revisited
8.plot: The Guardians get a lesson in rivalry on and off the field from Washington Redskins Robert Griffin III and Dallas Cowboys DeMarcus Ware as Ricky saves the world from Sudden Death's intergalactic evil plot.

9.title: All-Star Deception
9.plot: NFL Legends Cincinnati Bengals Cris Collinsworth and Dallas Cowboys Michael Irvin coach the kids' All-Star game, while Troy makes an "all-star" play of his own by saving the Super Bowl teams' Megacores.

10.title: Sudden Death Showdown
10.plot: The Super Bowl is in New York, but with 30 Megacores missing, the Guardians, along with Houston Texans J.J. Watt and San Francisco 49ers Vernon Davis, must defeat Sudden Death before he sends Earth hurling into deep space.

11.title: Knights of the Sky, Part 1
11.plot:

12.title: Knights of the Sky, Part 2

13.title: The Return of Drop Kick
13.plot: The kids are off to summer camp but Tua's "good luck" runs out when Drop Kick returns! New England Patriots Danny Amendola and Atlanta Falcons Matt Ryan come to Tua's rescue and show the Guardians luck can be skill in disguise.

14.title: Troy's Comeback
14.plot:
Know what this is about?
 Be the first one to add a plot.

15.title: Chip Off the Old Blocker
15.plot: Oakland Raiders Hall of Famer Howie Long gives Ish some fatherly advice about expectations. But with the Hall of Fame game under attack it's RZ6.0 who must confront the unexpected when he learns his son Wild Card is back.

16.title: Anticorian Unrest
16.plot: When the Anticorians attack, Carolina Panthers Greg Olsen and Indianapolis Colts Andrew Luck help out, and Ash finds her future step mom Linda is accidentally caught up in the action.

17.title: Rumors Run Wild
17.plot: Drop Kick captures Buffalo Bills C.J. Spiller and makes an evil clone from his DNA. The Guardians, who struggle to get past a rumor that threatens to come between Ish and Ash, turn to Tennessee Titans Kendall Wright for help.

18.title: Anticorians Outplayed
18.plot: A double-cross forces Sudden Death to turn on his own team, and leaves the Guardians unsure who to trust. Philadelphia Eagles Brent Celek and Arizona Cardinals Larry Fitzgerald give Ish and Marty advice on facing the unexpected.

19.title: Never Underestimate the Wild Card
19.plot: Wedding bells ring for Ash's dad, but Sudden Death wants a different kind of ring, from the Super Bowl! It's up to the Guardians, St. Louis Rams James Laurinaitis and New Orleans Saints Marques Colston, to save the big day.

20.title: The Final Betrayal
20.plot: Jacksonville Jaguars Marcedes Lewis and Tampa Bay Buccaneers Gerald McCoy help the Guardians at the International Series game in London when Sudden Death unleashes his biggest weapon yet. But can they trust Wild Card to help?

2.title: Change of Plans
2.plot: Thanksgiving Day is disrupted when Guardian Ish and Cowboys Linebacker DeMarcus Ware must face Drop Kick in Dallas. Ash's father gives her some upsetting news, and a new Guardian is put to the test in a battle with Wild Card.

3.title: Kick It Up a Notch
3.plot: Guardians Ish and Ash head to Foxborough where a mysterious Mimic Blitz Bot is on the loose. Patriots Tight End Rob Gronkowski and Kicker Stephen Gostkowski give Ash a lesson in self-confidence and perseverance.

7.plot: When Wildcard attacks in Chicago, Tua's got to channel the energy of the '85 Bears - with help from Hall of Famers Richard Dent and Mike Ditka - to defeat him.

1.title: Lions, Texans & Turkeys, Oh My!
1.plot: Ish and his family have moved from San Diego to Canton, Ohio so Ish can be a full-time guardian (and so his parents can work at the Football Hall of Fame). A new villain named WILD CARD destroys the "Safe Zone" above Canton and declares all-out war against "Rush Zone", the NFL and the world! Ash comes to visit for Thanksgiving and discovers that she has Guardian powers as they head for Detroit and save the Thanksgiving Day game.

2.title: Change of Plans
2.plot: When Texan players get sick on their way home from Detroit, it's quickly discovered that WC has stolen their Megacorel Ish and new Guardian Ash head for Dallas to stop a Scorpion Dot and outwit DK who has foolishly used the MC to power his latest Dlitz bot.

3.title: Kick It Up a Notch
3.plot: Ashley's Dad moves to Canton as she and Ish head for Foxbourough, MA to solve the mystery of a strange Shadow Bot, only to discover that DK has built an exact replica of a local sports reporter who nearly steals the MC.

4.title: Team Up
4.plot: Troy gets his NFL-R as he's caught up in action that gets him stuck in the new Super-Secure MC vault with DK; who steals the MC.

5.title: Frost and Ten
5.plot: When Megacore is attacked, Ish, Ash and Troy must put a valuable lesson they learned from Green Bay wide receiver Greg Jennings into action.

6.title: Sound Advice
6.plot: We discover that Yua's not only an amazing new Guardian, but he gets help and encouragement from Jets' Coach Rex Ryan.

7.title: Gridiron Ringer
7.plot: Tua gets his power coin as he helps defend Chicago against the escalating battle with WC as he launches the EEL and spins Soldier Field.

8.title: Spirit and Inspiration
8.plot: The Pittsburgh YTF champs are coming to Canton to play our kids - the guys are scared, all except for Marty, who shows how a can-do spirit and a positive attitude can save the day.

9.title: Oh Brother
9.plot: Ish and Ricky clash over good sportsmanship at the PPK event. Meanwhile, the Harboughs battle and Marty gets his coin.

10.title: The Mystery Guardian: Part 1
10.plot: Ricky falls under the influence of "Coach Wildwood", who is discovered to be Wild Card in disguise.

11.title: The Mystery Guardian: Part 2
11.plot: Ricky fails under the influence of "COACH WHILDWOOD", who discover is really WC in disguise! Bad Ricky helps DK steal the MC's then turns good, with the help of Ash and our Guardians.. but it may be too late since that makes THREE MC's for WC! Can he destroy the NFL & the world!?! In the cliffhander, WC attacks Canton and the HOF - will he succeed?

12.title: Mystery Solved
12.plot: Ricky goes good and earns his Shield coin; they all learn Wild Card's true identity, and the back story secrets that unite them, RZ, and Drop Kick.

13.title: Test of Friendship
13.plot: The boys fight to go to San Diego with Ash over the summer. Drop Kick succeeds in stealing the Colts Megacore but hides it from Wild Card.

14.title: Bands and Blitz Botz
14.plot: Marty and his brother go to a concert where Drop Kick and Sonic BB attempt to steal the Bengals Megacore.

15.title: There's Snow Place Like Home
15.plot: Ash and Ricky go to Chargers Training camp which makes all the other Guardians jealous - particularly Ish. These feelings are temporarily forgotten when all are called to protect San Diego from Wild Card's Freeze Blitz Bot.

16.title: Cheer Up, Troy
16.plot: The Guardians go to Nashville undercover at Titan's Jr. Mascot/Cheerleader camp while Wild Card devises a plan to recharge his suit. Drop Kick uses dream machine. Troy struggles with insecurity but ends up saving the day when he rescues both stolen Megacores.

17.title: Broken Dreams
17.plot: The Guardians go with various NFL teams to discover the importance of community service. Wild Card and Drop Kick try to capture the kids using the Dream Machine, but the Guardians are able to fight their way out of the dream world by facing their fears.

18.title: Send in the Clones
18.plot: In a surprise move, Coach Jones announces that Tua is this season's Captain of the Bulldogs. Marty and Troy think it's an invitation to goof off, until Tua learns how to be a real leader. Meanwhile, Wild Card unleashes his Evil Clone Guardians, and the Guardians are forced to fight on multiple fronts, as well as fight themselves.

19.title: Blitz Botz, Bills & Bucs
19.plot: HALL OF FAME GAME - Wild Card kidnaps Shandra in an attempt to find how to break into the HOK and steal the Core. Wild Card replaces the Bucs with a team of BB's and forces the Bills to play them. The Guardians and the Hall of Famers in Guardian suits compete in the wildest game ever.

20.title: Ninja Nightmare
20.plot: Armed with new ninja skills, the Guardians must battle Wild Card's army of ninja-styled BlitzBotz! With Dropkick's thirst for power escalating, will Wild Card be at a disadvantage?

21.title: Marty's Mistake
21.plot: Marty break the HOK computer and causes RZ to temporarily lose its programming. The guardians discover that RZ's avatar can leave the HOK and Wild Card makes a similar discovery and DK continues to plot and scheme.

-1.title: Wild Card 32, Guardians 0
-1.plot: Wild Card steals a powerful reverse energy device and uses it to drain all the power from hugecities! With more power than ever, will the Guardians be able to stop him before he takes over the world once and for all?

imdb.title: NFL Rush Zone
plot: A young football lover is chosen to help protect the Earth from various aliens who want to use the magic of the sport to destroy the world.::Benjamin Rothrock
